attributes.action: Stop News media scare mongering i.e driver/food/fuel shortages
attributes.additional_details: Stop them from scare  mongering or giving them a hefty fine for for scare mongering
attributes.background: Not allowing news media to say there are shortages, so the public won't panic buy, As they are causing the public to panic which is leading to roads being blocked and so many unnecessary shortages. people who are not panicking are unable to get necessities because of this.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the content of media reporting.
